Articles.Content:
I have had this game for a year now but now I have decided to create an account as I enjoy both playing the game and reading the forum posts.

I am looking forward to this especially as I am about to finish my exams tomorrow. Could someone tell me how to put pictures into a comment without including a link?

Thank you in advance

Almond

Right now, using a link from a free service like Imgur.com is the only way to share KSP pics. However, that's okay because Imgur is really easy to use. Just upload a screenshot and copy the BBCode link they provide.
